examples: Copy snippet content directly into your scaffold JSON
Modify id, text, and other properties as needed
Combine multiple snippets to build complex UIs
Use as starting points for custom components
tips: Always ensure unique IDs when using multiple snippets
Adjust gap and padding values to match your design system
Combine stack snippets to create complex layouts
